name: zEEz The Game
short_description:
zEEz will be a labyrinth game with multiplayer (online) a lot of item to find for a lot of different thing like torchlight to see in the darkest part of the maze.player will be in cooperation or not(depending on what he does to the other player) the game will include level to unlock awesome thing (when the website will be ready you will have a better overview of the game) personnalisation of the player will be there singleplayer too and all the maze in the game will be super giant with 3 or 4 level to go up and only one exit(i propose cooperation to success in this game)


sorry for my bad english i am from quebec so i usually talk french.

and i am only to program this game so be gentle!
